info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:11PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Putnam and northeastern Allen Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 310 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Beaverdam, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bluffton and Pandora around 325 PM EDT. This includes Interstate 75 between mile markers 131 and 141. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
